src:
Hasil Pemanasan MotoGP Malaysia: Joan Mir dan Suzuki Terdepan
03 Nov 2019, 09:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Suzuki Ecstar, Joan Mir, sukses mencatat waktu tercepat dalam sesi pemanasan (WUP) MotoGP Malaysia di Sirkuit Sepang pada Minggu (3/11/2019).
Pebalap Spanyol ini diikuti oleh pebalap Monster Energy Yamaha, Maverick Vinales, di posisi kedua dan pebalap Petronas Yamaha SRT, Franco Morbidelli, di posisi ketiga.
Sementara itu posisi keempat dan kelima masing-masing ditempati oleh pebalap Repsol Honda, Marc Marquez, dan pebalap Ducati Team, Andrea Dovizioso.
Berikut hasil WUP MotoGP Malaysia 2019.
text:
Malaysian MotoGP Warming Results: Joan Mir and Suzuki Leading
Nov 3, 2019, 09:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Suzuki Ecstar racer, Joan Mir, successfully recorded the fastest time in the Malaysian MotoGP warm-up session (WUP) at the Sepang Circuit on Sunday (3/11/2019).
The Spanish rider was followed by Yamaha Energy Monster racer, Maverick Vinales, in second place and Petronas Yamaha SRT rider, Franco Morbidelli, in third position.
Meanwhile the fourth and fifth positions were each occupied by Repsol Honda rider Marc Marquez and Ducati Team rider Andrea Dovizioso.
Following are the results of the 2019 Malaysian MotoGP WUP.
